title: Lvl 30 Account and cant comment on boards
body: So this account is lvl 30, and i went to post something on the team recruitment forums post and i was unable, it said that I needed to be lvl 6 to post on the boards, am I missing something?

replies.body: An account might need to sync up with the boards when it posts for the first time, so it didn't know right away that you were 30. Everything looks okay now, though!
